character.name: Bloch
description: Your ship's mentalist. Specializes in <c=boldPink>reducing incoming damage</c>, <c=boldPink>card draw manipulation</c> and <c=boldPink>discard effects</c>.

OnDiscard.name: On Discard
OnDiscard.description: This action only triggers whenever this card is discarded during your turn without playing it.

Spontaneous.name: Spontaneous
Spontaneous.description: This action only triggers whenever a turn starts with this card in hand, or if it's drawn for the first time this turn.

Scry.name: Scry
Scry.description: Look at the top <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> cards of your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. If needed, reshuffle the <c=keyword>discard pile</c> first. Choose cards to discard.

ChooseAura.name: Choose Aura
ChooseAura.description: Choose an <c=C2FF60>Aura</c> to replace this action with until end of combat. Gain <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c> of this <c=C2FF60>Aura</c>.

uiSubtitle.OnPlay: You will gain this <c=C2FF60>Aura</c> when playing this card.
uiSubtitle.OnDiscard: You will gain this <c=C2FF60>Aura</c> when discarding this card.
uiSubtitle.OnTurnEnd: You will gain this <c=C2FF60>Aura</c> when you end your turn with this card in hand.

DiscardedVariableHint.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = The amount of cards you have discarded this combat (<c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c>).
DiscardedVariableHint.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = The amount of cards you have discarded this combat.

Veiling.name: Veiling Aura
Veiling.description: Reduce incoming hits by <c=C2FF60>1</c> and <c=downside>decrease this by <c=C2FF60>1</c></c>.

Feedback.name: Feedback Aura
Feedback.description: When hit, deal <c=C2FF60>1</c> hull damage to the enemy and <c=downside>decrease this by <c=C2FF60>1</c></c>.

Insight.name: Insight Aura
Insight.description: At the start of your turn, <c=action>Scry <c=C2FF60>1</c></c>, draw <c=C2FF60>1</c> card and <c=downside>decrease this by <c=C2FF60>1</c></c>.

Intensify.name: Intensify
Intensify.description: All of your <c=C2FF60>Auras</c> trigger again for each stack of this. <c=downside>Lose half of it at the start of each turn, rounded up.</c>

Intuition.name: Intuition
Intuition.description: At the end of each turn, gain 1 <c=status>INSIGHT AURA</c>.

MindMap.name: Mind Map
MindMap.description: At the end of your turn, choose up to {0} cards to <c=cardtrait>retain</c>.

SplitPersonality.name: Personality Split
SplitPersonality.description: The next {0} <c=action>attacks</c> or <c=action>launches</c> are copied and mirrored against the ship's center.

AuraMastery.name: AURA MASTERY
AuraMastery.description: Every 2 <c=status>VEILING AURA</c> you gain, gain 1 <c=status>FEEDBACK AURA</c> or <c=status>INSIGHT AURA</c> at random.

Composure.name: COMPOSURE
Composure.description: <c=status>INTENSIFY</c> now only reduces by 1 at the start of each turn.

FutureVision.name: FUTURE VISION
FutureVision.description: Whenever you keep any cards during <c=action>Scry</c>, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> one of the cards at random.

LastingInsight.name: LASTING INSIGHT
LastingInsight.description: Refund 1 <c=status>INSIGHT AURA</c> for each card kept during its <c=action>Scry</c>.

LongTermMemory.name: LONG-TERM MEMORY

description.stateless: At the end of your turn, you may choose a card to retain or discard. Each action can only be selected once every 2 turns.
description.stateful: At the end of your turn, you may choose a card to <c={{RetainColor}}>retain</c> or <c={{DiscardColor}}>discard</c>. Each action can only be selected once every 2 turns.

LongTermMemory.browseText: Choose a card to retain or discard.

VainMemories.name: VAIN MEMORIES
VainMemories.description: Gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY FRAGMENT</c> whenever you discard a card during your turn without playing it.

ChangePerspective.name: Perspective Change
ChangePerspective.description: Convert any <c=C2FF60>Aura</c> into {{ConvertToIntensifyAmount}} <c=status>intensify</c> or {{ConvertToAuraAmount}} of a different <c=C2FF60>Aura</c>.

description.None: Attack for <c=redd>{{Damage}}</c>. <c=action>On Discard</c>, gains <c=keyword>{{Gain}}</c> damage this combat.
description.A: Attack for <c=redd>{{Damage}}</c>. <c=action>On Discard</c>, gains <c=keyword>{{Gain}}</c> damage this combat.
description.B: Gain <c=keyword>{{Gain}}</c> damage this combat. <c=action>On Discard</c>, attack for <c=redd>{{Damage}}</c>.

description.None: Choose cards to discard, then draw as many.
description.A: Choose cards to discard, then draw as many, +2.
description.B: Choose cards to discard, then draw as many. Twice.
Gain 1 of each <c=C2FF60>Aura</c>. <c=action>On Discard</c>, gain 1 of each <c=C2FF60>Aura</c>.

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C2FF60>Bloch</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C2FF60>Bloch</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=C2FF60>Bloch</c> cards to your hand.

palette: Your next colorless card also grants you <c=value>1</c> <c=status>VEILING AURA</c>.
